A0: Fire investigators and police on Monday
RelatedSentence: Fire investigators and police on Monday revisited the condemned apartment at 15417 Kipling Avenue to capture photos and video footage of the scene where Glacia Ramsey , 7 , and Peaches Christburg , 2 , died when someone set fire to the home .

Fire investigators and police on Monday revisited the condemned apartment at 15417 Kipling Avenue to capture photos and video footage of the scene where Glacia Ramsey , 7 , and Peaches Christburg , 2 , died when someone set fire to the home .

Fire investigators and police on Monday revisited the condemned apartment at 15417 Kipling Avenue to capture photos and video footage of the scene where Glacia Ramsey , 7 , and Peaches Christburg , 2 , died when someone set fire to the home .
Collecting the evidence will green light the demolition of the publicly maligned property , officials said .
Collecting the evidence will green light the demolition of the publicly maligned property , officials said .
Broken glass and debris , pools of green sludge and a gaping hole in the front yard are just a few of the hazards that litter the lot , which authorities left unfenced after the blaze .
The state of the home -- and Cleveland 's slow road to razing it -- has ruffled City Councilman Michael Polensek and many neighborhood residents .
This property is not only an absolute eyesore , but a safety hazard too , Polensek said .
Last week , Maureen Harper , a spokeswoman for Mayor Frank Jackson , said the city was ready to tear down the building once prosecutors and police cleared the property .
Last week , Maureen Harper , a spokeswoman for Mayor Frank Jackson , said the city was ready to tear down the building once prosecutors and police cleared the property .
Last week , Maureen Harper , a spokeswoman for Mayor Frank Jackson , said the city was ready to tear down the building once prosecutors and police cleared the property .
The county prosecutor 's office punted the issue to police .
We have advised CPD that they need to get a high - quality video and still photographs of the interior of the house for evidence before it could be torn down , said spokesman Joe Frolik in an email .

A police spokeswoman said officers would execute a search warrant at the home Monday and Tuesday .

She would not give any other details .
